text: Pop rock is a subgenre of pop music and rock music that uses catchy pop style, with light lyrics over top of guitar-based songs. Pop rock is very popular. Famous singers like Taylor Swift and Olivia Rodrigo sing in the pop rock zone. ==Artists== * Deep Blue Something * Sixpence None the Richer ==Other websites== * Server about alternative rock music * Analysis of pop & rock Category:Pop rock
title: Pop rock
